name: Reawakening: Necromancer's Domain
description:
In this 2D strategy game, play as a necromancer that can use defeated enemies in your army of skeletons, or upgrade your army in various ways. Currently, the game only supports endless mode where the goal is to try to survive as long as possible before your base gets destroyed. Face off against goblins, witches, wolfs, orcs, and ogres, which all have different strengths and weaknesses while managing your resources in real-time.

The gameplay is similar to Stick Wars, a game about a 2D battle simulator using real-time strategy with a variety of troops. In this game, you can use enemy corpses to do three things: spawn a skeleton of the same enemy type or summon a minion that can mine bones from graves, or summon more graves for the minions to mine. Bones can be used for upgrading a specific skeleton's attack, defense multiple times, or upgrading your max troop size (which includes both skeletons, and minions).

This game was made for the Three Button Jam [8 Bits To Infinity}, which had the theme, of cycles. NOTE: Not all animations are complete, but the game play's well

Play Time: 1-2 Minute Tutorial, 1-5 Minutes Per Game

Controls: Default: A = Left Button, S = Middle Button, D = Right Button (Button Remapping Available)

Credits:

  • Ian Connors: Art & Animation
  • Caleb Kahn: Programming & UI Design

Music: Spooky Ride & 8 Bit March by Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org)
